{
  "id": "21834",
  "title": "Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout",
  "description": "Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout in Build 2002071610021.",
  "OB": "1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Notice that the first item on the second row is deleted.
4. Also notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs.",
  "EB": "The Launch item should stay on the second row when deleting an item from the Coolbar.",
  "SR": "Ensure that deleting an item from the Coolbar does not move the Launch item from the second row to the first row." 
}
